title: Desert Punk (Sunabouzu) Disc (DVD5 ISO) 5 of 6
description:
This is a dvd-rip of the anime series Desert Punk. The disk was ripped with Anydvd and Dvdshrink. It has been compressed to a DVD-5 ISO. Just mount or burn and enjoy.

Series Summary:
 In the future, Japan is a wasteland. In the Great Kantou Desert, scattered humans eke out a living in the hot sand. Among them, a short-statured man they call \"Sunabouzu\" makes a living as a bounty hunter. Like a demon of the sand, he seems unbeatable. Yet, like all men, he has a particular weakness for the opposite sex...

Disc Summary:
The Great Kanto desert is a place of extremes, where foe becomes friend and friend becomes fodder.

Junko\&#039;s coquettish ways have finally caught up with her and now she\&#039;s on the run from a lustful sniper. Appealing to Desert Punk and Kosuna for their help, the three hightail it across the sand only to find themselves facing an even nastier adversary. Will the rag-tag trio have to join forces with their trigger happy pursuer to survive this new challenge?

On a job that takes them underground (literally!), the Punk and his apprentice confront a lot of faces from their past. Apparently everyone and their mutt has been part of an anti-government movement...

Disc Title: Under the Desert

Feel free to PM me with a suggestion for another series release.
